articles.description: The Denver Broncos defense is going to be more aggressive in 2022.
articles.content: New Denver Broncos defensive coordinator Ejiro Evero has learned under plenty of defensive geniuses. Working under some legendary figures in the game like Monte Kiffin, Wade Phillips, and Vic Fangio … [+3090 chars]

articles.author: Terry Wallace, AP
articles.title: Former Rangers player Josh Hamilton pleads to misdemeanor in daughter-assault case - KXAN.com
articles.description: One-time Texas Rangers slugger Josh Hamilton pleaded guilty Tuesday to a misdemeanor in a case arising from an altercation with his teenage daughter, officials said.
articles.content:
(AP) One-time Texas Rangers slugger Josh Hamilton pleaded guilty Tuesday to a misdemeanor in a case arising from an altercation with his teenage daughter, officials said.
